categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Leh'ahnyo Vas was a female individual who was a Jedi Padawan during the Clone Wars. The clone trooper Drak served under Vas' command.
Leh'ahnyo Vas was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
